plot: A single father with three teenaged children struggles to keep his family together. One of them is mentally retarded. The father enrolls him in a special state-run school, where the boy develops a love for sports.
title: Una forma especial de amor
plot_es: A single father with three teenaged children struggles to keep his family together. One of them is mentally retarded. The father enrolls him in a special state-run school, where the boy develops a love for sports.
plot_en: A single father with three teenaged children struggles to keep his family together. One of them is mentally retarded. The father enrolls him in a special state-run school, where the boy develops a love for sports.
